languages.text:
At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wielder gains {uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} for each adjacent ally.
Whenever an adjacent ally takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}% of that damage is dealt to the wielder instead.
languages.original_text:
В конце своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} персонаж получает {uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} за каждого союзника на соседних клетках.
Когда союзник на соседней клетке получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, {uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}% от этого урона забирает на себя обладатель этого щита.

traits.locale_text:
At the end of their turn, the wielder gains {uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} temporary wounds for each adjacent ally.
Whenever an adjacent ally takes damage, {uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}% of that damage is dealt to the wielder instead.

At the end of their turn, the wielder gains {uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} temporary wounds for each adjacent ally.
Whenever an adjacent ally takes damage, {uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}% of that damage is dealt to the wielder instead.

languages.text:
Kullanan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonunda bitişikteki her dost birim için {uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır.
Bitişikteki bir dost birim {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} aldığında bu hasarın %{uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} kadarı, kullanan kişiye verilir.

At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wielder gains {uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} for each adjacent ally.

traits.locale_text:
Kullanan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonunda bitişikteki her dost birim için {uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır.
Bitişikteki bir dost birim {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} aldığında bu hasarın %{uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} kadarı, kullanan kişiye verilir.

Kullanan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} sonunda bitişikteki her dost birim için {uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} geçici sağlık puanı kazanır.
Bitişikteki bir dost birim {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} aldığında bu hasarın %{uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} kadarı, kullanan kişiye verilir.

languages.text:
Al final de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el portador gana {uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} por cada aliado adyacente.
Cada vez que un aliado adyacente sufra {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, un {uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} % de ese daño se inflige al portador en su lugar.
languages.original_text:
At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wielder gains {uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} for each adjacent ally.
Whenever an adjacent ally takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}% of that damage is dealt to the wielder instead.

traits.locale_text:
Al final de su turno, el portador gana {uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} heridas temporales por cada aliado adyacente.
Cada vez que un aliado adyacente sufra daño, un {uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} % de ese daño se inflige al portador en su lugar.

languages.text:
装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}结束时，为每位邻近盟友提供{uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。
每当邻近盟友受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，此次伤害的{uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}%改为由装备者承担。
languages.original_text:
At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wielder gains {uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} for each adjacent ally.
Whenever an adjacent ally takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}% of that damage is dealt to the wielder instead.

traits.locale_text:
装备者的回合结束时，为每位邻近盟友提供{uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}点临时生命值。
每当邻近盟友受到伤害时，此次伤害的{uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}%改为由装备者承担。

languages.text:
À la fin de son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, l'utilisateur gagne {uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} par allié adjacent.
Chaque fois qu'un allié adjacent subit des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, {uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} % de ces dégâts sont infligés à l'utilisateur à la place.
languages.original_text:
At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wielder gains {uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} for each adjacent ally.
Whenever an adjacent ally takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}% of that damage is dealt to the wielder instead.

traits.locale_text:
À la fin de son tour, l'utilisateur gagne {uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} blessures temporaires par allié adjacent.
Chaque fois qu'un allié adjacent subit des dégâts, {uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} % de ces dégâts sont infligés à l'utilisateur à la place.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}終了時、使用者は隣接する味方につき{uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}を負う。
隣接する味方がダメージを受けるたびに、その{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}の{uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}%を使用者が変わりに受ける。
languages.original_text:
At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wielder gains {uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} for each adjacent ally.
Whenever an adjacent ally takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}% of that damage is dealt to the wielder instead.

traits.locale_text:
ターン終了時、使用者は隣接する味方につき{uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}一時的な傷を負う。
隣接する味方がダメージを受けるたびに、そのダメージの{uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}%を使用者が変わりに受ける。

ターン終了時、使用者は隣接する味方につき{uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}一時的な傷を負う。
隣接する味方がダメージを受けるたびに、そのダメージの{uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}%を使用者が変わりに受ける。

languages.text:
Am Ende seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} erhält der Träger {uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} für jeden Verbündeten auf einem angrenzenden Feld.
Erleidet ein Verbündeter auf einem angrenzenden Feld {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, erleidet {uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} % dieses Schadens der Träger.
languages.original_text:
At the end of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the wielder gains {uip|THP|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} for each adjacent ally.
Whenever an adjacent ally takes {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, {uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1}% of that damage is dealt to the wielder instead.

Erleidet ein Verbündeter auf einem angrenzenden Feld Schaden, erleidet {uip|Reflect|febbd2a3f1f14a9eb90ecf9eaece04d1} % dieses Schadens der Träger.
